name: OneDimension (Haeherfeder)
description:
A very simple one-dimensional game

I made a small game with Python, Pygame and Pyinstaller.

In this game, similar to Doodle Jump, you try to climb as high as possible by jumping from the red platforms. If you fall, you lose! 

How To Control:

- you are the black dot, the background is green

- Space Bar to jump off red platforms or the dark-red ground

- Arrow Key Down (press and hold) for slow motion

- Arrow Key Up for a Double Jump (resets with a normal jump)

- Space Bar (press and hold) to charge a super-jump with more speed

 -> while super-jumping: no double jump or slow motion

- break walls (dark blue) with a double jump

Since any text would be 2D, the score is represented by a rising column. If it reaches the top of the screen, it starts again at the bottom with a different color

This game is simple yet tricky. I just wanted to share it here, have fun!
